trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Joplin
There were no other sightings in Joplin on or around October 2nd 2009
divs: sighting detailsi received this e-mail on 3\34\2010: suject: ufo sighting 10-2-2009 hi i live in joplin,mo @ approx: 716pm i was standing outside looking up due east south east . my mom and i saw a dimly lit amber colored large delta\v shaped object fly about 1500' agl. and it was flying from south to north at i estimate 200 mph. it was in view for about 10 to 15 seconds! it made no noise at all! and it had a reflective quality about it. i'm disabled, a us army veteran, and a civilian parachute rigger and ex-skydiver. we are approx 4 miles from the joplin airport it couldn't have been a conventional aircraft? no noise from object at all! i know what meteors look like i know every civilian aircraft and military aircraft by recognition. i know what i saw wasn't normal! thx (name and address omitted) have attempted to contact this person via e-mail but so far he has not responded. margie kay
